_source.text: A Confederacy of Dunces, by John Kennedy Toole - The whole story is driven by an argument between its male protagonist and his female, superior intellectual rival through letter correspondence and his subsequent constantly failed attempts to prove he's better than her, and quite possibly one of the greatest books in the English language;

text: A Confederacy of Dunces, by **John** **Kennedy** Toole - The whole story is driven by an argument between
his subsequent constantly failed attempts to prove he's **better** **than** her, and quite possibly one of the greatest books in the English language;
